xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set($object=$doc.newObject('QA.ExecutionClass')) #if($request.addObject) #set($prefix='QA.ExecutionClass_') #foreach($entry in $request.parameterMap.entrySet()) #if($entry.key.startsWith($prefix)) #set($propNameStart=$entry.key.indexOf('_', $prefix.length())+1) #set($propertyName=$entry.key.substring($propNameStart)) #set($discard=$object.set($propertyName, $entry.value.get(0))) #end #end #set($discard=$doc.save()) $response.sendRedirect($doc.getURL()) #else ## we set $object because it is used in ExecutionSheet #set($discard=$doc.use($object)) $xcontext.setDisplayMode("edit") {{html wiki="true"}}
{{include reference="QA.ExecutionSheet"/}}

{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
